text.__SUMMARY__: Ixora chinensis, commonly known as Chinese ixora, is a species of plant of the genus Ixora.
text.Synonyms:
The Catalogue of Life regonises the following synonyms:
Bemsetia paniculata Raf.Gaertnera hongkongensis Seem.Ixora blanda Ker Gawl.Ixora coccinea Curtis, nom. illeg.Ixora colei W.BullIxora crocata Lindl.Ixora dixiana W.BullIxora dubia Schult. & Schult.f.Ixora flammea Salisb.Ixora incarnata Roxb. ex Sm.Ixora kroneana (Miq.) Bremek.Ixora pallida Reinw. ex Miq.Ixora rosea Sims, nom. illeg.Ixora speciosa Willd.Ixora stricta Roxb.Ixora stricta var. mekongensis Pierre ex Pit.Pavetta arborea BlancoPavetta chinensis (Lam.)
